name: Mastery Talisman: Press the Advantage
description: After an opposing character takes Elemental Reaction damage: Draw 2 cards, and create Omni Element ×1. (Can be triggered up to 2 times per Round)
descriptionraw: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After an opposing character takes Elemental Reaction damage:</color> Draw 2 cards, and create $[K411] ×1. (Can be triggered up to 2 times per Round)
descriptionreplaced: <color=#FFFFFFFF>After an opposing character takes Elemental Reaction damage:</color> Draw 2 cards, and create <color=#FFFFFFFF>{SPRITE_PRESET#1111}Omni Element</color> ×1. (Can be triggered up to 2 times per Round)
